projects.title: LeafBank
projects.shortdesc: An iOS Application for logging and surveying medical marijuana usage among U.S. Veterans to aid in the research of cannabis

projects.title: MatrixVision
projects.shortdesc: A Web Application that takes a users webcam video and manipulates the pixels to create a matrix-like filter

projects.title: Critix
projects.shortdesc: A Web Application that allows photographers and digital illustrators to share and critic works of other content creators
projects.description: Critix is an image hosting application similar to Instagram, but is designed for a specific kind of audience: creators who are looking for constructive criticism about their works.
projects.technologies: Embedded JavaScript, HTML5, Materialize CSS, MongoDB + Mongoose, Node.js, Express.js

projects.title: Library Kiosk Application
projects.shortdesc: A Windows Application to replace the current outdated systems libraries use today.

projects.title: Import Car Database
projects.shortdesc: A database designed and implemented from scratch
